text: tiṭṭamāka nām umakku muṉṉar tūtarkaḷai aṉuppiyirukkiṉṟōm; avarkaḷil cilaruṭaiya varalāṟṟai umakkuk kūṟiyuḷḷōm; iṉṉum evarkaḷuṭaiya varalāṟṟai umakkuk kūṟavillaiyō (avarkaḷum) attūtarkaḷil irukkiṉṟaṉar (ivvirucārāril) entat tūtarum allāhviṉ aṉumatiyiṉṟi enta attāṭciyaiyum koṇṭu varuvataṟku (atikāramum) illai ākavē allāhvuṭaiya kaṭṭaḷaivarum pōtu, (aṉaivarukkum) niyāyamākat tīrppaḷikkappaṭum; aṉṟiyum, anta iṭattil poyyarkaḷ tām naṣṭamaṭaivārkaḷ
